snippet: U.S. Labor Secretary Tom Perez offered details this week about the Obama administration's push to revise overtime pay regulations, confirming the Labor Department may close a "loophole" in the test used to determine which workers are managers....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Labor's Perez Details Obama's Overtime Rules Overhaul
headline.main: U.S. Labor's Perez Details Obama's Overtime Rules Overhaul

lead_paragraph: U.S. Labor Secretary Tom Perez offered details this week about the Obama administration's push to revise overtime pay regulations, confirming the Labor Department may close a "loophole" in the test used to determine which workers are managers.
